post_text: March 25, 2020 at 4:05 PM#1i have 1 sequence ,  but in sequence have 10 cue , i want to assign cue to executor button,example ;   macro line 1 :  assign cue 1 sequence 1 at executor 1.101macro line 2 :  assign cue 2 sequence 1 at executor 1.102macro line 3 :  assign cue 3 sequence 1 at executor 1.103   ......  until macro line 10it can't run  , what i'm wrong bro ?    i want to have only one sequence but i want to use cue in sequence to executor .thx for answer brobest regards

posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: March 25, 2020 at 6:43 PM#4as far as I know you can't assign a cue to an executor. you'd have to copy the cue to a new sequence and then assign that sequence to an executor.copy seq x cue 1 at seq y cue 1 /oassign seq y exec 1.101copy seq x cue 2 at seq z cue 1 /oassign seq z exec 1.102etc.I have no idea why you'd want to do this, but this syntax should help you out.
